Package biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

Class LessVariableOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.LessVariableOptionsBuilder
  • public class LessVariableOptionsBuilder
extends Object

    Creates values of the global and modify variables options. The builder allows adding multiple variables with the same name (they are not replaced).

    Example code: 

     Map<String, String> variablesMap = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
 variablesMap.put("name1", "value1");
 variablesMap.put("name2", "value2");
 
 List<LessVariableOption> variables = new LessVariableOptionsBuilder()
                                              .append(variablesMap)
                                              .append("name3", "value3")
                                              .append(new LessVariableOption("name2", "value4"))
                                              .build();
 
 System.out.println(variables.get(0)); // name1=value1
 System.out.println(variables.get(1)); // name2=value2
 System.out.println(variables.get(2)); // name3=value3
 System.out.println(variables.get(3)); // name2=value4
    Since:
    2.0.0
    See Also:
    LessOptions
